name: ENTROPOLY
description:
Wavedash into the psychedelic realms of the elements and help Poly fight chaos to restore balance.



  • Tight controls inspired by platform fighters
  • Dozens of challenging levels
  • Hubs worlds to freely explore
  • Secrets to find
  • Level editor to craft your own levels
  • Native Gamecube Controller support
  • Local multiplayer volleyball mode

Easy to pickup, hard to master. Intricate mechanics giving you full control of the character with layers of depth and secret techniques to discover.
